duties_responsibilities.duty: Interface with customers on all levels of technical support including product and solution suggestions, system power tree analysis, simulation, customized evaluation board design, and PCB layout review.
Work closely with sales team on customer development strategies.
Provide innovative new product ideas to marketing and design teams based on market understanding and development trends.

education_certification.credential: BSEE (MSEE preferred) with a minimum of 3-5+ years experience in Electrical Engineering with a focus on power management
